abstract: The Zappos story is inspiring, thought-provoking and impressive. I was hoping for a little math.
snippet: The Zappos story is inspiring, thought-provoking and impressive. I was hoping for a little math.
lead_paragraph: The first big speech at the Inc. 500 Conference, where I’m blogging today, was by Tony Hsieh, the chief executive of Zappos. For those (few) of you who have never heard of Zappos, it is the online store based in Las Vegas that sells mostly shoes, has just hit a billion dollars in sales and was just bought by Amazon for fairly close to a billion dollars. A very interesting story and a very impressive track record.
